products.name: Executive Office Chair
products.shortDescription: Ergonomic design with premium leather upholstery
products.longDescription: Our Executive Office Chair combines luxury and functionality, featuring premium leather upholstery and advanced ergonomic design. Perfect for long work sessions, this chair provides exceptional lumbar support and adjustable features to ensure maximum comfort throughout your workday.

products.name: Modern Dining Chair
products.longDescription: Sleek and contemporary, our Modern Dining Chair brings style and comfort to any dining space. Crafted with premium materials and featuring clean lines, this chair complements both modern and traditional decor while providing exceptional seating comfort.

products.name: Vintage Armchair
products.shortDescription: Classic design with rich wood finish
products.longDescription: Step back in time with our elegant Vintage Armchair, featuring classic design elements and rich wood finish. This timeless piece combines old-world charm with modern comfort, making it a perfect statement piece for any sophisticated living space.

products.name: Royal Dining Table
products.longDescription: Our Royal Dining Table is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, featuring solid wood construction and elegant design. Perfect for hosting family gatherings and dinner parties, this table combines durability with timeless style to create memorable dining experiences.

products.longDescription: Our Modern Coffee Table features a sleek minimalist design with a stunning glass top that creates an airy, open feeling in any living space. The perfect centerpiece for contemporary homes, combining functionality with sophisticated style.

products.longDescription: Our Conference Table Set is designed for professional environments where important decisions are made. This impressive set includes a large conference table and eight matching chairs, perfect for boardrooms and meeting spaces that demand both functionality and prestige.

products.longDescription: Our Garden Patio Set is perfect for outdoor entertaining and relaxation. Made with weather-resistant materials, this set includes a table and two chairs designed to withstand the elements while providing comfort and style for your outdoor space.
